src:
Nesreča na štajerki: zaprli so avtocesto
Štajerska avtocesta je zaradi prometne nesreče v smeri Maribora zaprta.
04 Nov 2019, 16:54 by N. Č.
CELJE – Zaradi prometne nesreče je za ves promet zaprta štajerska avtocesta med priključkoma Celje zahod in Celje center proti Mariboru, poroča prometnoinformacijski center za državne ceste.Kot so za Slovenske novice pojasnili pri PU Celje, sta bila v nesreči udeleženi tovorno in osebno vozilo, pri čemer sta oba voznika lažje poškodovana. Po prvih podatkih je voznica osebnega avtomobila zaradi okvare osebnega vozila ustavljala na odstavnem pasu. Kljub temu da je prižgala vse štiri smernike, jo je spregledal voznik tovornega vozila, ki je pripeljal po odstavnem pasu in trčil v njeno vozilo. Tovorno vozilo se je pri tem prevrnilo.Del avtoceste so zaprli zaradi odstranjevanje posledic nesreče. Obvoz za osebna vozila je možen po vzporedni cesti med priključki Žalec, Arja vas in Celje center. Tudi tam že nastaja zastoj.
text:
Styrofoam Accident: They closed the freeway
The Styrian motorway is closed due to a traffic accident in the direction of Maribor.
04 Nov 2019, 15:54 by N. Č.
CELJE - Due to a traffic accident, the Styrian motorway between Celje West and Celje center towards Maribor is closed for all traffic, according to the Traffic Information Center for state roads. making both drivers more easily damaged. According to initial information, the driver of the passenger car stopped in the lane due to the failure of the passenger car. Despite having lit all four turn signals, she was overlooked by the truck driver who drove down the lane and collided with her vehicle. The truck overturned. Part of the highway was closed to eliminate the aftermath of the accident. Detours for cars are possible along the parallel road between the Žalec, Arja vas and Celje center connections. There is also a stalemate.
